org.plexian.grumy.configuration

Class FileConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.plexian.grumy.configuration.Configuration
      • org.plexian.grumy.configuration.FileConfiguration
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    YAMLConfiguration

    public abstract class FileConfiguration
extends Configuration
    Author:
    walt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.io.File CONFIGURATION_FOLDER
      This is an object that points to the folder that holds all our configuration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileConfiguration()
      Creates a new instance of FileConfiguration, creating the config directory in the process.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        public java.io.File getConfiguration(java.lang.String s)
        Gets the given configuration as a File.
        Parameters:
        s - The name of the configuration.
        Returns:
        A file object to the file, or CONFIGURATION_FOLDER if given filename is a directory.

      • getConfiguration

        public java.io.File getConfiguration(java.lang.String s,
                                     java.io.File directory)

      • loadConfiguration

        public java.lang.String loadConfiguration(java.lang.String s)
        Reads a configuration file into a string which can be pumped into a parser.
        Parameters:
        s - The name of the file to read.
        Returns:
        The contents of the file, or "" if no such file/directory.

      • loadConfiguration

        public java.lang.String loadConfiguration(java.lang.String s,
                                          java.io.File directory)

      • getConfigurationAsStream

        public java.io.InputStream getConfigurationAsStream(java.lang.String s)
        Gets the configuration as an input stream, reading from a file.
        Parameters:
        s - The configuration name.
        Returns:
        The input stream if file exists, or null if not.
